column4: is a grassland steppe and wooded flat plain situated in western Siberia.The steppe has an area of 117
column5: 000 km² and stretches between the Irtysh and the Ob Rivers. Barabinsk is the largest city on the steppe.  The Baraba steppe also contains an important Russian agricultural district.

column1: Lake Chany is located in the Baraba steppe.
